entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries later this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
